root.name: A-10 Cuba!
root.description: A-10 Cuba! features the ability to fly a realistically simulated A-10 Thunderbolt II. The player has access to a variety of missiles and bombs with which to equip their airplane, in addition to the GAU-8 Avenger Cannon. The game focuses on both air-to-air dogfighting, as well as strikes against ground targets such as tanks. The game takes place on the island nation of Cuba, specifically around Guantanamo Bay.

similar_games.game: Ace Combat X: Skies of Deception
